name: Tower Defense (callmeshorty)
description:
Replaced the sounds and music of an Unreal Engine tower defense game.

Controls:

Don't let the enemies into your base.

Click on empty pillars to build a tower. 

Click on gold on the ground to gain gold to buy more towers.

Call minions to fight by clicking on your base.

Pause menu:

Cheat-gold will give you extra gold.

Exit will exit the game.

Click pause again to unpause the game.
